item.title: Hindi text Comprehensibility
item.description: Objective Assess the quality of Hindi translation Check the comprehensibility of a Hindi translation Scope This project partially addresses the translation checking bottleneck by creating a method that could be integrated into A set of power tools for translation consultants, which will allow them to do their checking work more thoroughly and more consistently An early warning system for translators, which will alert them to obvious problems so they can address them earlier in the translation process An equalizer for administrators and strategists, which will allow them to compare and evaluate methodologies and products (e.
